0f454227-79d4-4974-8452-f6a4a5b167e7.definition: verbal misrepresentation intended to take advantage of you in some way

fillInTheBlankQuestions.question: The investigation revealed a web of _________, involving bribery, blackmail, and betrayal at the highest levels of the corporation.
Rumors of _________ in the election process led to widespread protests demanding transparency and accountability.
The novel's hero, a cunning detective, unraveled the _________ that lay at the heart of the town's most respected family.
In a light-hearted twist, the so-called ancient curse was nothing more than _________ by the castle's caretaker to scare away tourists.
The board game, designed for ages 12 and up, encouraged players to engage in _________ to amass fortunes and defeat their rivals.
Behind the charming facade of the seaside resort, a tale of _________ unfolded, involving the disappearance of a famous actress.
The magician's act, while seemingly full of _________, was actually an elaborate display of skill and misdirection.
Critics accused the filmmaker of _________, alleging that parts of the documentary were fabricated for dramatic effect.
The auction was halted amid accusations of _________, with claims that the winning bid had been secretly predetermined.
In an unexpected twist, the story's villain turned out to be the hero's mentor, who had been teaching him the art of _________ to test his integrity.
The startup's rapid fall was attributed not just to market forces but to internal _________, eroding trust and leading to its demise.
The fantasy novel's protagonist faced challenges not only from dragons and beasts but also from the _________ of court politics.
Allegations of _________ in the bidding process for the new city project led to calls for an independent investigation.
The discovery of _________ in the peaceful village shook the residents, revealing a hidden world of intrigue and deception.
The secret society's meetings were rife with _________, as members plotted to outmaneuver one another for power and influence.
